description: Next.js project, it's a Netflix Clone project where you can access reviews of movies. You have to create an account and log in to access the data. I discovered how to use Next Auth, Prisma and MongoDB. All the data come from an API named 'The Movie Database'. I used Next Router to navigate between the different pages and tailwind for styling, obviously.
React project, it's a recipes website. All the data come from an API named 'Spoonacular'. I used React Router to navigate between the different pages and styled-components for styling, obviously.
Website from Scratch for a plane rent enterprise. My first customer project. The website has been made with React, react-router, CSS modules. I also send the form by mail with Emailjs.
